scripts.deploy: powershell -Command "$tempPath = 'C:/temp/designtech-deploy'; if (Test-Path $tempPath) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force $tempPath }; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $tempPath -Force; Copy-Item -Recurse './dist/*' $tempPath; Push-Location $tempPath; git init; git checkout -b gh-pages; git add .; git commit -m 'Deploy to GitHub Pages'; git remote add origin https://github.com/alexandergostajob/designtech-graph.git; git push -f origin gh-pages; Pop-Location; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force $tempPath"
